intro.p: This node transforms molecules according to reaction-base set of rules. See the examples for more details.
The node is based on the Indigo cheminformatics toolkit.

fullDescription.option: Appends a new molecule column (with the name as specified in the text field) if checked, replaces the original column otherwise.

ports.inPort: Table containing Indigo molecules to transform
ports.outPort: The same as input, plus the columns with the created molecules
